metadata.description: In Night of the Living Deadpool, the Merc with the Mouth fought his way through the zombie apocalypse. In the end, our hero found a “cure” of sorts to this horrible outbreak—any zombie that ate Deadpool transformed into another Deadpool. And they lived happily ever after? Not so fast, that wandering hordes of Deadpools might just be worse than flesh-hungry walking corpses.
metadata.name: Return of the Living Deadpool
